thePython:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
thePython:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

thePython:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
thePython:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
thePython:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

thePython:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
thePython:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

thePython:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
thePython:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !thePython:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

thePython:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
thePython:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !thePython:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
